Qatar National Convention Centre (QNCC) has secured certification to ISO 9001:2008, the international standard for quality management systems, and also ISO 22000 – The International Standards for Food Safety Management.

This recognition builds on the QNCC’s current standing as one of the leading exhibition, conference and event venues in the Middle East region and complementing the numerous accolades already received including:
  • ‘Best Events Venue’ at the Middle East Event Awards 2013
  • ‘Middle East’s Leading Exhibition & Convention Centre’ by World Travel Awards;
  • ‘Best Congress and Convention Centre, Middle East’ by Business Destinations Travel Awards;
  • ‘Best Convention Centre in Middle East’ by MICE Report Awards in 2012
Abdul Aziz Al Emadi, CEO of AMLAK, the company managing Qatar National Convention Centre, said: “Any form of achievement is attained through hard work and commitment. The staff at QNCC has not fallen short of this. I take this opportunity to applaud the QNCC Team for embracing the Quality Management System as a critical means of ensuring quality service delivery to our customers.”

QNCC was awarded the quality standard by Applus Velosi, recognizing the focus on delivering efficient and effective venue management and event services.
